features: PREMIUM CUSHIONING: Ergonomic office chair with memory foam cushions that contour to your body
FLEXIBLE AIR TECHNOLOGY: Lumbar cushions pivot when you move to support your back at every angle
STYLISH AND VERSATILE: A tasteful complement to any office, home, or entertainment space
WARM AND INVITING: Black bonded leather upholstery with elegant wood detailing
ALL DAY COMFORT: Fully adjustable height, recline, and tilt settings
body.description: Add a sophisticated flair to any office space with the La-Z-Boy Hyland Executive Office Chair. This black leather office chair features a flexible AIR lumbar system that pivots to provide back support whenever you shift. Layered memory foam cushions contour to the body for continued comfort. Soft, padded armrests and adjustable height, recline, and tilt functions allow you to find the perfect settings to stay comfortable all day. With high-end finishes like soft bonded leather upholstery and elegant solid wood detailing, this ergonomic office chair offers the ideal blend of style and support for any workspace. The casters are intended for use on carpet and not recommended for use on tile or hardwood floors. LA-Z-BOY® is a trademark of LA-Z-BOY® Incorporated and is used under license to Living Style (Singapore) Pte. Limited.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: La-Z-Boy Hyland Executive Office Chair with AIR Technology Contoured memory-foam cushions and flexible AIR technology provide exceptional comfort Add a comfortable and supportive seat to your office with the La-Z-Boy Hyland Executive Office Chair. Featuring an elegant finish with bonded-leather upholstery and solid wood detailing, this ergonomic chair tastefully complements any office decor. Its flexible AIR lumbar system pivots to support your back whenever you shift, while layered memory-foam cushions contour to your body to keep you comfortable. One-touch levers allow you to easily adjust the height, tilt, and lift of the chair. At a Glance: Ergonomic office chair combines traditional style and modern performance Soft bonded-leather upholstery with premium wood detail Lumbar cushions pivot as you move, supporting your back in any position Layered memory-foam cushions deliver a comfortable and supportive seat Easy-to-use levers adjust height, recline, and tilt for improved body alignment

Made from Luxurious Bonded Leather The La-Z-Boy Hyland Executive Office Chair is upholstered in soft bonded leather with rich, solid wood arms and base for a distinguished look. Combining sophisticated style and ergonomic performance, this swivel chair is an elegant addition to any workspace. Flexible AIR Technology and Memory-Foam Cushioning This ergonomic office chair features ComfortCore layered memory-foam cushions that provide all-day comfort. Flexible AIR lumbar technology helps improve your posture and provides back support whenever you shift positions. Adjustable One-Touch Settings The La-Z-Boy Hyland Executive Office Chair supports up to 250 pounds and offers adjustable height, recline, and tilt settings to ensure you remain comfortable and properly supported. The leather office chair measures 44 to 47 inches high by 25.8 inches wide by 31 inches deep with a back height of 27 inches.

About La-Z-Boy: Live Life Comfortably The La-Z-Boy story begins in 1927 with the invention of the iconic La-Z-Boy recliner by two cousins in a Michigan garage. Since those early days, La-Z-Boy has stayed true to its mission to bring exceptional comfort and quality to every room of your house. The founding principles of comfort, innovation, and industry-leading craftsmanship are at the heart of every piece of furniture La-Z-Boy designs and builds. From upholstered sofas, loveseats, chairs, and ottomans to solid wood bedroom and dining room sets, La-Z-Boy seeks to enrich the lives of people around the world by turning houses into homes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Lazy Boy Desk Chair is the best Office's and your home office space in your home
reviews.reviewText: It’s being used in his main office for jbtrucktepair, he’s getting a lot of use out this term while he’s in the office doing invoices and working on computer, he would recommend this lazy boy office chair to all of his employees and colleagues. He found it easy to assemble, the chair fit’s him perfectly, it’s made of wood and and is designed to be durable , the quality of this chair gives so much comfort and stability you will be so glad you found this chair and I hope that you enjoy this piece of furniture as much as I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: Very well made, very comfortable, great back support, beautiful chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but doesn't stay in place
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed this as an office chair for a couple years but now it gradually lowers to the lowest position. I like sitting high to view my monitors but now I end up lower than my desk in a matter of an hour. Must be faulty hydraulics. Other than that, it's a comfortable chair, I am 5'7.5"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but not sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very comfortable. It was easy to put together. The “air” feature does not keep the chair cool and is completely not worth talking about. You will get warm if you sit in this chair for a long time - it’s nothing as breathable as a mesh chair (obviously). The build quality is not very good. It does not feel like a sturdy chair. The arms wobble when you lean on them. I am sure it will eventually break. The only useful control is the height adjust. The chair can lean back, but it requires significant force and is not something you will choose to do.When it does break, I will buy something else. It is really comfortable for now, though.Update:Thanks to the coronavirus, I'm now using this chair full time. It's terrible. First, the right arm had already broken during incredibly infrequent use. Now that I have been using the chair full time for a couple weeks as I WFH, I hate it. The irony is that this is a chair fitted with "AIR Technology". Well let me tell you - air is the last thing my entire backside feels while sitting in this chair. The whole thing is like one hot recipe for swamp ass. I completely understand why my office chairs at work are mesh now - I have to take regular walks to dry out.Do not buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm comparing this chair to all my previous chairs. I tend to buy a new office/game chair every year for $100 or so. An arm falls off, the fake leather peels from the fabric, the stitching comes undone and the chair will slowly lower while you're on the phone.My intent is to buy one chair that will last three years, at $100 per year. I'm 5'10" and 215 lbs.My first thought was the chair was too damn comfy. I sat in my old chair and found that it had increased in hardness dramatically since I bought this new chair. I even went to the loft and sat in the game room chair. That chair is too damn hard. Back to the new chair and I slowly sink into the soft seating and comfort. I don't like my old chairs anymore.I've noticed my lower back is a bit sore. Not sore in general from sitting in my old hard chair but just sore in one location. This chair is improving my posture and my back isn't used to having good posture.You can lean back but you won't stay there without an effort. This chair wants you to sit up straight while working. You can't lean back and flip a switch to maintain that angle either. You can lock it so that you cannot lean back. You just can't leisurely recline. This chair wants to work you. This is not a gaming chair.Careful when installing. You need a firm grip when tightening the screws but herculean efforts will split the wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not up to the quality I expected from the La-Z-Boy name
reviews.reviewText: Update: Customer service was great. I called, waited on hold about 15-20 minutes, and they offered to ship me a replacement seat (but apologized that it would likely take a while to arrive from the factory due to the upcoming Lunar New Year). I asked for replacement bolts which they shipped to me quickly from California. The replacement bolt seems to be working so far, and my chair arm hasn't fallen off since. I'm entirely satisfied by my customer service experience, but still wished for a bit higher quality on the chair itself. Original review now follows.It's a chair, and I can kind of safely sit in it, so I'll award it two stars. Problem is that one of the bolts for the arms is thinner than the nut it screws into, so the threads strip and the arm falls off. I'll update with my experience with customer service and/or return process.Good:- soft and seems comfortable- packed well, arrived undamaged- fairly easy to assemble, except the bolts for the arms are hard to get right (and one of my bolts is defective)- controls are fairly easy to reachBad:- assembly instructions are difficult to find (they were hidden inside the bag for the back piece, and looked more like an advertising tag than instructions)- chair back doesn't quire line up in the middle, so I feel like my body is being shoved to the right- one of the bolts for the arms doesn't fit the receiving threads properly, so just strips the threads and pulls out, basically ruining the chair- two of the 5 legs for the castors have splits in the wood: one is a three-inch-long split on the top and visible near where it attaches to the center, the other large split is through one of the screws underneath -- I worry if these splits get larger some of the wood will fall off (the actual structure is metal underneath the wood, so the structural integrity is not threatened)- the lowest height adjustment is pretty high, much higher than my old chair, so probably not good for short people. You probably need to be around average adult height to be able to comfortably rest bare feet on the ground.Pending:- customer service regarding the defective bolt (received over Christmas holidays so haven't been able to contact them yet)Bottom line: I cannot recommend this chair. The quality is not what I expected for this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable - great purchase
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair a year ago this past Christmas and waited a while to provide feedback on purpose. It is still very comfortable and in great condition. The price was great and I've had no problems with the chair. It also looks great in my home office. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
Amazing chair!! I would recommend this product to other customers. Received the chair in a timely fascion from the shipping company. I am very happy with their service.
Es muy cómoda y elegante. Tiene unos pequeños defectos en la madera de los brazos pero son muy insignificantes
Right out of the box, the wooden base was cracked.Awaiting resolution by customer service.

I bought a La-Z-Boy chair because they are supposed to be comfortable. this 400 dollar chair is the stiffest most uncomfortable chair I've ever sat in. definitely not what i was expecting compared to other office chairs i've sat in, in the past. i will be requesting a refund
